document.full_text: thousands of bahraini shiites gathered before a revered cleric on friday denounced death sentences given to protesters over anti-government rallies crushed last month in the u.s.-allied gulf kingdom.
document.title: shiite worshippers condemn bahrain death sentences
lines_and_colors: thousands of bahraini shiites gathered before a revered cleric on friday denounced death sentences given to protesters over anti-government rallies crushed last month in the u.s.-allied gulf kingdom.
